##General Workflow

Workflow

Read in libraries
	Baseline set
		tidyverse (ggplot2, tibble, tidyr, readr, purrr, dplyr,stringr, forcats)
		tidytext (text mining toolset using tidyverse)
		tm (text mining toolset)
		janitor (data cleaning)
		
	Supplemental set (examples)
		gmodels (cross tables)
		e1071 (naive Bayes)
		gutenbergr (interface to Gutenberg Project)
		knitr (dynamic report generation)
		quanteda (quantitative text analysis)
		rio (data I/O)
		SnowballC (language stemming)
		stopwords (multi-lingual lists)
		
Read in dataset and sanitize
	Use janitor package 
	
Extract, organize data subset
	Mutate any 
	Convert necessary variables to/from factors
	Compress data subgroups (forcats)
